text: Abj is an abbreviation for abject, abjunction, and abjuration. ABJ may also refer to: * ABJ (motorcycle), a 1950s bike built by AB Jackson Cycles of Birmingham, England * Abaeté Linhas Aéreas, Brazil airline ICAO code * Félix- Houphouët-Boigny International Airport, Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire IATA code * Aka-Bea language, ISO 639 code * The American Business Journal, monthly business publication * Anything But Joey, pop-rock band * Bachelor of Arts in Journalism, degree at the University of Georgia, United States ==See also== * * * AB (disambiguation) * BJ (disambiguation)
title: ABJ
